opendb_id.description: Unique identifier for the document (UUID v4)

min_fan_rpm.description: Min value of the fan's rotational speed in RPM. If it is a constant, just fill in min_fan_rpm and ignore max_fan_rpm

max_fan_rpm.description: Max value of the fan's rotational speed in RPM. If it is a constant, just fill in min_fan_rpm and ignore max_fan_rpm

min_noise_level.description: The min noise level of the cooler in dB. If it is a constant, just fill in min_noise_level and ignore max_noise_level

max_noise_level.description: The max noise level of the cooler in dB. If it is a constant, just fill in min_noise_level and ignore max_noise_level

color.description: The color of this product (e.g., ['Black', 'Red']). Each color of the product should be included in the array.

height.description: The height of the CPU cooler in mm

cpu_sockets.description: An array of CPU socket types supported by the cooler (e.g., AM4, AM5, LGA 1700, LGA 1200)

water_cooled.description: Indicates if the cooler is water-cooled

radiator_size.description: If water-cooled, specify the radiator size in mm (e.g. 360, 280, 240, etc)

fanless.description: Whether the cooler can operate fanless

fan_size.description: Size of the included fan(s) in mm (e.g. 140, 120)

general_product_information.description: General product information and retailer SKUs
